text: circumstances in which a liquidator may be ordered to pay personally costs which have been ordered against the company in liquidation
liquidator caused company to bring proceedings to recover corporate assets
proceedings unsuccessful due to estoppel and ex parte james defences
personal costs order sought against liquidator
